articles.title: World Cup live scores, updates: USA vs. England score; FIFA World Cup 2022 bracket, USMNT schedule, standings - CBS Sports
articles.description: Follow along as the Americans end the day's action with a showdown against tournament heavyweights England
articles.content: The main event of Day 6 of the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar is here as England and the United States square off with the top of Group B on the line. Wales vs. Iran kicked off the the action dramatica… [+1673 chars]
